361 
WWUS41 KOKX 022001
WSWOKX

URGENT - WINTER WEATHER MESSAGE
NATIONAL WEATHER SERVICE NEW YORK NY
301 PM EST MON FEB 2 2015

...WINTER STORM IMPACTS THE AREA TODAY...
...SIGNIFICANT ICING THROUGH THIS EVENING...

CTZ005>011-NJZ002-004-103>105-NYZ067>071-073-030600-
/O.CAN.KOKX.WS.W.0003.000000T0000Z-150202T2300Z/
/O.EXB.KOKX.WW.Y.0006.000000T0000Z-150203T0600Z/
NORTHERN FAIRFIELD-NORTHERN NEW HAVEN-NORTHERN MIDDLESEX-
NORTHERN NEW LONDON-SOUTHERN FAIRFIELD-SOUTHERN NEW HAVEN-
SOUTHERN MIDDLESEX-WESTERN PASSAIC-EASTERN PASSAIC-WESTERN BERGEN-
EASTERN BERGEN-WESTERN ESSEX-ORANGE-PUTNAM-ROCKLAND-
NORTHERN WESTCHESTER-SOUTHERN WESTCHESTER-BRONX-
301 PM EST MON FEB 2 2015

...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM EST TUESDAY...
...WINTER STORM WARNING IS CANCELLED...

THE NATIONAL WEATHER SERVICE IN NEW YORK HAS ISSUED A WINTER WEATHER
ADVISORY FOR THE LOWER HUDSON VALLEY...NORTHEAST NEW JERSEY AND
SOUTHERN CONNECTICUT...WHICH IS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM EST TUESDAY.
THE WINTER STORM WARNING HAS BEEN CANCELLED.

* LOCATIONS...THE LOWER HUDSON VALLEY...NORTHEAST NEW JERSEY AND SOUTHERN
  CONNECTICUT

* HAZARD TYPES...ADDITIONAL SNOW AND ICING.

* ACCUMULATIONS...ADDITIONAL SNOW ACCUMULATION OF 1 TO 2
  INCHES...ISOLATED AMOUNTS TO 3 INCHES.

* TIMING...SNOW IS FORECAST TO END BEFORE MIDNIGHT FROM WEST TO
  EAST.

* WINDS...NORTHWEST 10 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH.

* TEMPERATURES...0 TO 10 ABOVE.

* WIND CHILLS...0 TO 10 BELOW.

* IMPACTS...HAZARDOUS TRAVEL DUE TO SNOW AND ICE COVERED ROADS AND
  WALKS.

PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS...

A WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY MEANS THAT PERIODS OF SNOW...SLEET...OR
FREEZING RAIN WILL CAUSE TRAVEL DIFFICULTIES. BE PREPARED FOR
SLIPPERY ROADS AND LIMITED VISIBILITIES...AND USE CAUTION WHILE
DRIVING.

&&

$$

CTZ012-030600-
/O.CAN.KOKX.WS.W.0003.000000T0000Z-150202T2300Z/
/O.EXB.KOKX.WW.Y.0006.000000T0000Z-150203T0600Z/
SOUTHERN NEW LONDON-
301 PM EST MON FEB 2 2015

...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM EST TUESDAY...
...WINTER STORM WARNING IS CANCELLED...

THE NATIONAL WEATHER SERVICE IN NEW YORK HAS ISSUED A WINTER
WEATHER ADVISORY FOR SOUTHERN NEW LONDON COUNTY...WHICH IS IN
EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM EST TUESDAY. THE WINTER STORM WARNING HAS BEEN
CANCELLED.

* LOCATIONS...SOUTHERN NEW LONDON COUNTY.

* HAZARD TYPES...ADDITIONAL SNOW AND FREEZING RAIN...CHANGING TO
  SNOW.

* ACCUMULATIONS...ADDITIONAL SNOW ACCUMULATION OF 1 TO 3 INCHES...WITH
  UP TO ONE TENTH OF AN INCH OF ICE.

* TIMING...SNOW IS FORECAST TO END BY MIDNIGHT.

* WINDS...NORTHWEST 10 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH.

* TEMPERATURES...LOWS AROUND 10 DEGREES.

* WIND CHILLS...0 TO 5 BELOW.

* IMPACTS...HAZARDOUS TRAVEL DUE TO SNOW AND ICE COVERED ROADS AND WALKS.

PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS...

A WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY MEANS THAT PERIODS OF SNOW...SLEET...OR
FREEZING RAIN WILL CAUSE TRAVEL DIFFICULTIES. BE PREPARED FOR
SLIPPERY ROADS AND LIMITED VISIBILITIES...AND USE CAUTION WHILE
DRIVING.

&&

$$

NJZ006-106>108-NYZ072-074-075-078-080-176>179-030600-
/O.EXT.KOKX.WW.Y.0006.000000T0000Z-150203T0600Z/
HUDSON-EASTERN ESSEX-WESTERN UNION-EASTERN UNION-
NEW YORK (MANHATTAN)-RICHMOND (STATEN ISLAND)-KINGS (BROOKLYN)-
NORTHWESTERN SUFFOLK-SOUTHWESTERN SUFFOLK-NORTHERN QUEENS-
NORTHERN NASSAU-SOUTHERN QUEENS-SOUTHERN NASSAU-
301 PM EST MON FEB 2 2015

...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM EST TUESDAY...

* LOCATIONS...BROOKLYN...QUEENS...MANHATTAN...STATEN ISLAND... 
  SOUTHERN PORTIONS OF NORTHEAST NEW JERSEY...AND NORTHERN LONG 
  ISLAND.

* HAZARD TYPES...ADDITIONAL SNOW.

* ACCUMULATIONS...ADDITIONAL SNOW ACCUMULATION OF 1 TO 2 INCHES...ISOLATED
  AMOUNTS TO 3 INCHES.

* TIMING...SNOW IS FORECAST TO END BEFORE MIDNIGHT FROM WEST TO EAST.

* WINDS...NORTHWEST 15 TO 25 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH.

* TEMPERATURES...IN THE TEENS.

* WIND CHILLS...0 TO 5 BELOW.

* IMPACTS...HAZARDOUS TRAVEL DUE TO SNOW AND ICE COVERED ROADS AND WALKS.

PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS...

A WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY MEANS THAT PERIODS OF SNOW...SLEET...OR
FREEZING RAIN WILL CAUSE TRAVEL DIFFICULTIES. BE PREPARED FOR
SLIPPERY ROADS AND LIMITED VISIBILITIES...AND USE CAUTION WHILE
DRIVING.

&&

$$

NYZ079-081-030600-
/O.EXT.KOKX.WW.Y.0006.000000T0000Z-150203T0600Z/
NORTHEASTERN SUFFOLK-SOUTHEASTERN SUFFOLK-
301 PM EST MON FEB 2 2015

...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM EST TUESDAY...

* LOCATIONS...THE TWIN FORKS OF LONG ISLAND.

* HAZARD TYPES...SNOW AND FREEZING RAIN.

* ACCUMULATIONS...SNOW ACCUMULATION OF UP TO 1 INCH...ALONG WITH 
  AROUND A TENTH OF AN INCH OF ICE.

* TIMING...FREEZING RAIN...SLEET AND SNOW CHANGING TO SNOW THEN
  ENDING AROUND MIDNIGHT.

* WINDS...NORTHWEST 20 TO 30 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 35 MPH.

* TEMPERATURES...IN THE TEENS.

* WIND CHILLS...0 TO 5 BELOW.

* IMPACTS...HAZARDOUS TRAVEL DUE TO ICE AND SNOW COVERED ROADS.

PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS...

A WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY MEANS THAT PERIODS OF SNOW...SLEET...OR
FREEZING RAIN WILL CAUSE TRAVEL DIFFICULTIES. BE PREPARED FOR
SLIPPERY ROADS AND LIMITED VISIBILITIES...AND USE CAUTION WHILE
DRIVING.

&&

$$
